data.message: I tried everything to get that verification page but nothing is working you should verify me blue tick mark or gray i don't care i just neeeddd one.

replies.message: Hi Hayden. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at: http://bit.ly/2t2U5wZ. -Jessica
I've made a page and I picked public figure and I did the things it says to do in the help center and it never said verify this page, unless I'm doing it wrong.
